trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您將主機的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]上控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]頁面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，放置子項目，並決定的大小<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref>-衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目應該用來排列本身和其子系之父系內的最終區域。

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實際大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定裝載的控制項的背景以作為環境屬性。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個屬性所對應更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>裝載控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the Background property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關對應背景屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Brush* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*筆刷*看到XAML 屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> set to the background color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>設定背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*> to build the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫的基底類別實作<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>來建置裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: The parent window's handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: 父視窗的控制代碼 (HWND)。

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定子控制項所裝載<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Only one child control can be hosted, but Child can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個子系控制項可以裝載，但子系可以有任意數目的子系。

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項不能是最上層的表單。

trans-unit.source: If Child is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果子系是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage `<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` ## XAML Values *object* A element (or a possible subclass).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法`<`*物件* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` # # XAML 值*物件*A元素 （或可能的子類別）。

trans-unit.source: *hostedControl* An element that specifies the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: *hostedControl*項目，指定裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 指定在標記中的自訂控制項通常需要 xmlns 對應，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試指派最上層的表單，以裝載的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>刪除包含此物件的視窗。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: A window handle.
trans-unit.target: 視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref>，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫處置方法處置基底<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>才能正常運作，從 modelessly 開啟時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableWindowsFormsInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 EnableWindowsFormsInterop 方法，以將所有轉送鍵盤訊息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>開啟 modelessly。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EnableWindowsFormsInterop method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: EnableWindowsFormsInterop 方法安裝的訊息篩選條件所需的正確運作時所開啟的非強制回應表單[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您需要呼叫這個方法一次只為特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定裝載的控制項的字型家族。

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定會影響其範本使用屬性做為參數的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: 其不會影響其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個屬性所對應更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>裝載控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 裝載控制項中所使用的字型系列。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*double* 等於或大於 0.0，但小於.值的字串表示法

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為 1 是可接受的。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>用來設定裝載控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a layout error, such as a skew or rotation that <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> does not support, is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 發生於配置錯誤，例如偏差或旋轉， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref>不支援，會發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*> to measure the size of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫的基底類別實作<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>來測量的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>物件，並傳回適當的大小版面配置引擎。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>

trans-unit.source: Size constraints in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: 調整大小的條件約束[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]版面配置是硬式條件約束。

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過限制，主機必須裁剪的內容，裝載的區域內。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作會強制執行這項行為。

trans-unit.source: The available size for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 可用的大小，如<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所需的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.
trans-unit.target: 強制的對應屬性的翻譯。

trans-unit.source: Calling the OnPropertyChanged method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: OnPropertyChanged 方法的呼叫可能需要時已變更的上階元素的屬性，但的區域數值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>項目尚未變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 識別已變更，以及提供該屬性的舊的和新值之屬性的引數。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 指定內裝載所需的邊框間距大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Thickness* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*粗細*看到XAML 屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> structure representing the padding pf the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref>結構，代表裝載填補 pf[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性對應會決定如何設定屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>項目會影響主控[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *屬性對應*支援兩種架構之間的互通性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> properties to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref>對應<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>上裝載的內容屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: Scales the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 調整主控[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項，然後追蹤的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls do not support scaling in the same way as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項不支援做為相同的方式調整[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，調整[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項係數會是 1 至 0.5 的因數，再回到係數會是 1，一般情況下，復原之控制項的原始大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WindowsFormsHost 項目的配置考量](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Override the ScaleChild method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 ScaleChild 方法，以提供自訂的縮放行為託管[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 新的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>表示套用至主控的縮放比例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定裝載的控制項的定位點索引。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>欄位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來變更索引標籤瀏覽表單上控制項之間的順序。

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: 具有較低的定位點索引的控制項，會在索引較高的控制項之前的焦點。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: Tab 導覽和焦點的定位點索引。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Forwards focus from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 轉送焦點從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]來裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>項目收到的索引標籤命令<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>方法，控制在中的第一個符合資格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>接收焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的第一個控制項`request`參數。

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 當`request`是<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>，則行為是類似於按下 TAB 鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: 當`request`，<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>則行為是類似於按下 SHIFT + 索引標籤</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"></xref> that specifies the focus behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"> </xref>指定焦點行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a control was activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，存取裝載的子視窗的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: 裝載之視窗的視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
trans-unit.target: 要處理訊息。

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 可能是適用於處理訊息的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來儲存較小的資訊，例如旗標。

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 可能是適用於處理訊息的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 是否應該標記為產生的事件處理。

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
trans-unit.target: 子視窗的視窗控制代碼。
